text: Ra hamile tiniharuka lagi tauratama yo adesa lekhidi'eka thiyaum ki jyanako badala jyana ra amkhako badala aamkha ra nakako badala naka ra kanako badala kana ra damtako badala damta ra khasaâ€“khasa gha'uharuko yastai kisimabata badala hunecha, tara juna manisale badala (pratisodha) nali'i mapha garidincha bhane tyo usako lagi kaphpharaha (prayascita) hunecha. Ra jasale allahale pradana gareka adesaharu bamojima nirnaya gardainan tyasta manisaharu nai atyacari hun
